sections.heading: for any proceeding under the Uniform Community Property Disposition at Death Act is in the county in this state where:(1) The decedent was domiciled at the time of death; or(2) The decedent's property was located at the time of death if the decedent was not domiciled in Nebraska at the time of death
sections.text: for any proceeding under the Uniform Community Property Disposition at Death Act is in the county in this state where:(1) The decedent was domiciled at the time of death; or(2) The decedent's property was located at the time of death if the decedent was not domiciled in Nebraska at the time of death.SourceLaws 2024, LB83, ยง 15.
